name: Project Z.E.D
description:
Latest Trailer

Join the Discord: http://discord.gg/SrBFQBg

Follow updates for the project on Twitter here: https://twitter.com/ProjectZEDfg

Project Z.E.D is a high speed indie Fighting game project being developed on the IKEMEN engine.

Build 26.08.2022 info:

After receiving some great feedback from the previous build, I've fixed some bugs that were found and managed to do a little bit of character balance too, as well as including a finished version of the Riverside stage.

Patch Notes:

General

- Burst no longer causes damage

- Remove meter build while moving

- Added additional limiters to wall bounce, ground bounce and wall stick moves

- Riverside stage is now officially finished

Jonathan

- Reduced hitstun on 5.HP and 6.LK

- Reduced startup frames on 6.LK from 28 -> 18

- Jon's EX projectile now comes out if normal fire ball is thrown before

- Iceflake is removed when opponent is thrown

Jinzai

- Level 3 Dancing Dragon follow up now ground bounces

Tomoe

- Sweep no longer hits off the ground

- EX Severing Strike has increased range

If you have any questions about the build feel free to send me a message through the Discord.
